biotools.summary: Analyse ChIP-seq data of histone modifications with broad genomic footprints like H3K27me3. It allows for calling modified regions in single samples as well as for calling differentially modified regions in a comparison of two samples.

bioschemas.name: histoneHMM
bioschemas.summary: Analyse ChIP-seq data of histone modifications with broad genomic footprints like H3K27me3. It allows for calling modified regions in single samples as well as for calling differentially modified regions in a comparison of two samples.
